postParser.tip.curlVersion: This feature internally uses curl. If your system-level curl version is lower than 8.14, please configure the correct curl path in the system settings.
postParser.tip.requestInterval: The request interval configuration is temporarily unavailable. The built-in default interval is 3 seconds.
postParser.tip.ollamaRequired: This feature internally uses Ollama. You need to install and run Ollama first, and install at least one model. Then configure the Ollama API address in the system settings.
postParser.tip.ollamaModel: This feature will prioritize the largest model in the Ollama model list.
postParser.tip.ollamaTested: Currently, deepseek-r1:14b and 32b have been tested and can be used safely.
postParser.tip.browserIntegration: Some sites can integrate quick actions through the browser (such as one-click task creation). You can check the "Third-Party Integrations" section.
